tosdr.tldr:
https://www.rapidshare.com/#!rsag_tou
> Primarily, RapidShare shall provide the functions listed in Number I. (1) 24 hours a day and seven days a week. This accessibility can be guaranteed at a monthly average availability rate of 99.5%. Periods, during which the server cannot be accessed via the internet due to technical issues or other problems, which are not within the sphere of influence of RapidShare (third party faults, force majeure, etc.), are excluded.
